Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A campsite, located at the base of the Ellion Mountain. From here you can go back towards town or up the mountain on a narrow path. The campsite has about ten tents scattered around a large campfire that no longer burns. There are a number of footprints in the dirt around the camp, leading off along the various paths.
A clearing in the woods, with tents scattered everywhere.
A campsite, located at the base of the Ellion Mountain. From here you can go back towards town or up the mountain on a narrow path.
A muddy path weaves between the trees, leading up the mountain.
A muddy path weaves between the trees, leading towards the town.

A dozen green and brown tents scatter around a cold campfire. Each tent is closed but perhaps you could RUMMAGE in them to see what was left behind. You also notice that the campground is rather messy with empty tankards, food containers, and other random useless junk around.
A dozen green and brown tents scatter around a cold campfire.
A campfire that has been put out long ago.
Footprints cover the ground around the camp, and some can be followed along the paths into the forest.
A small creek runs through the campsite. The water looks fresh and inviting.
A small creek runs through the campsite.
